## Description {#details}

This file defines the interface for the loop nest analysis.

<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a3085b412e1547510b6891a60494b1d14">Loops</a>.front()-&gt;getLoopDepth() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74fccdd55e3793730ca5fd831595b16d">LoopVectorTy</a> Result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#aec57833927c1ee7b4ce3c49d3867ee23">getNumLoops</a>(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Retrieve a vector of perfect loop nests contained in the current loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// nest. For example, given the following  nest containing 4 loops, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// member function would return &#123;&#123;L1,L2&#125;,&#123;L3,L4&#125;&#125;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   for(i) // L1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     for(j) // L2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       &lt;code&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       for(k) // L3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///         for(l) // L4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;LoopVectorTy, 4&gt;</a> getPerfectLoops(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the loop nest depth (i.e. the loop depth of the &#39;deepest&#39; loop)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// For example given the loop nest:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   for(i)      // loop at level 1 and Root of the nest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     for(j1)   // loop at level 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///       for(k)  // loop at level 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     for(j2)   // loop at level 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getNestDepth() would return 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a2e412f8b916b22399f515ff64bfb6705"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a2e412f8b916b22399f515ff64bfb6705">getNestDepth</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NestDepth =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a3085b412e1547510b6891a60494b1d14">Loops</a>.back()-&gt;getLoopDepth() - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopnest/#a3085b412e1547510b6891a60494b1d14">Loops</a>.front()-&gt;getLoopDepth() + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NestDepth &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expecting NestDepth to be at least 1&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NestDepth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return the maximum perfect nesting depth.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This analysis provides information for a loop nest. The analysis runs on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// demand and can be initiated via AM.getResult&lt;LoopNestAnalysis&gt;.</span></CodeLine>
